column1: #text=Borrowing a book from the library is quite a fun task .
#text=Make sure you have a library card first .
#text=If not , you can ask the librarian about how to sign up for one .
#text=Next , you 'll want to find a book that you 'll want to read .
#text=If you have something in mind already , then you 'll head over to the computers and use the search to find the book .

#text=The computer search will tell you where exactly in the library the book is located , or it might tell you the book is not at this library and that you 'll have to request that they send it to the library for pick up later .
#text=If the book is available , navigate through the shelves to find the book .
#text=Each book has a unique number that is in order which makes finding the book pretty easy .
#text=Once you have located the book , bring the book with you to the counter and finish checking out the book .
#text=Be sure to remember when you have to return the book by !
